version_description: - Bug fix! The game sometimes crashed when you were climbing a ladder in front of a tunnel. That shouldn't happen anymore! Thanks for your patience through the holidays <3
- Bug fix! The game sometimes crashed when you were climbing a ladder in front of a tunnel. That shouldn't happen anymore! Thanks for your patience through the holidays <3

- Fix for the telescope, now you can actually see the stars
- UI transparency setting
- iPhone X fullscreen support
